column3: 2015 jimmie hurst age 80 of rogersville passed away friday (6/19/15). she was a member of the first baptist church of rogersville. she was a member of the rogersville shrine ladies auxiliary and the hasson chapter #179 order of eastern star. she was retired from head hunters beauty salon. she was preceded in death by her husband
column15: lucille turman. she is survived by daughter
column22: nc and steven hurst (kristy) of jacksonville
column26: of fall branch and joe willis (linda) of fall branch
column27: 10 grandchildren and 3 great grandchildren. the family will receive friends from 11:00 am - 2:00 pm monday (6/22/15) at christian-sells funeral home. eastern star services and funeral services will follow at 2:00 pm with rev. andy willis officiating. burial will follow at hawkins county memorial gardens. online condolences may be sent to the family at www. christiansells. com. upcoming events. funeral ceremony. jun 22. 2:00 pm christian-sells funeral homeus
